description.value:
Despite being a plant creature, the creature doesn’t gain the standard immunities associated with creatures of the plant type. Instead, a creature with this ability gains a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting effects}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poison}, polymorph, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning} effects, unless the effect specifies that it is effective against plants.

Format: Defensive Abilities limited plant benefits.

modifiers.name: Limited Plant Benefits
modifiers.notes: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects, paralysis, poison, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects, unless the effect specifies that it is effective against plants.
